name: watercolor diorama - one small patch of rain
description:
This is an original watercolor story diorama in a box. The story is written in ink on the inside of the lid. It reads:

She loved the rain:
the sound it made when she twirled her umbrella,
the shops and people
seen through morse code dashes and dots
of raindrops.

And on that Monday,
it rained JUST for HER!
- one small patch of rain
spotlighting
her whole day.
